languages.text: "В этом главное свидетельство того, что мы победим, эттфатер. Заберись в самую зловонную нору вселенной, где снуют и ползают лишь худородные и убогие нелюди, пади в самый мрак, а затем возгласи: "Кто здесь верует во Всеотца, братья и сестры?". И даже там, в гнилой утробе мира, услышишь ответ, и пойдешь на голос, и найдешь там достойного товарища. Каждый, кто верит в него и следует его стопами, получает шанс стать... кем-то большим и более достойным".

"This only proves that we will not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest hole in the universe, where only lowborn and wretched inhumans crawl, fall into darkness, and then cry out, 'Who here believes in the Allfather, sisters and brothers?' And even there, in the world's most rotten pit, you will hear an answer, and if you reach toward the voice, you will find a worthy companion. Everyone who believes in him and follows in his footsteps is given the chance to become... someone greater and more worthy."
languages.original_text: "В этом главное свидетельство того, что мы победим, эттфатер. Заберись в самую зловонную нору вселенной, где снуют и ползают лишь худородные и убогие нелюди, пади в самый мрак, а затем возгласи: "Кто здесь верует во Всеотца, братья и сестры?". Каждый, кто верит в него и следует его стопами, получает шанс стать... кем-то большим и более достойным".

traits.locale_text: "This only proves that we shall not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest place of the universe where only low-born and wretched subhumans crawl, fall into darkness and then cry out, 'Who among us believes in the Almighty, sisters and brothers?' And even there, in the world's most rotten maw, you will hear an answer, and reach toward the voice, and find a worthy companion. Everyone who believes in Him and follows His footsteps is given a chance to become... someone greater and more worthy."

"This only proves that we shall not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest place of the universe where only low-born and wretched subhumans crawl, fall into darkness and then cry out, 'Who among us believes in the Almighty, sisters and brothers?' And even there, in the world's most rotten maw, you will hear an answer, and reach toward the voice, and find a worthy companion. Everyone who believes in Him and follows His footsteps is given a chance to become... someone greater and more worthy."

languages.text: “这只能证明我们绝不会失败，狼领。那个时候，就算你落入了整个宇宙最肮脏的臭洞里，掉进了黑暗之中，那里只有低贱、邪恶的异形，你也没有放弃过。你在那里放声大喊：‘兄弟们，姐妹们！这里有没有信仰全父的人？’即使在那里，在世界上最肮脏的坑里，你也会听到答案。只要朝那个声音走去，你就会找到一位可靠的伙伴。所有信仰全父，追随全父脚步的人，都有机会成为……更加伟大，更加光明的人。”
languages.original_text: "This only proves that we will not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest hole in the universe, where only lowborn and wretched inhumans crawl, fall into darkness, and then cry out, 'Who here believes in the Allfather, sisters and brothers?' And even there, in the world's most rotten pit, you will hear an answer, and if you reach toward the voice, you will find a worthy companion. Everyone who believes in him and follows in his footsteps is given the chance to become... someone greater and more worthy."

traits.locale_text: “这只能证明我们绝不会失败，狼领。那个时候，就算你落入了整个宇宙最肮脏的臭洞里，掉进了黑暗之中，那里只有低贱、邪恶的异形，你也没有放弃过。你在那里放声大喊：‘兄弟们，姐妹们！这里有没有信仰全父的人？’即使在那里，在世界上最肮脏的坑里，你也会听到答案。只要朝那个声音走去，你就会找到一位可靠的伙伴。所有信仰全父，追随全父脚步的人，都有机会成为……更加伟大，更加光明的人。”

languages.text: «Eso solo demuestra que no perderemos, Aett-Vater. Puede ir al agujero más terrible del universo, donde solo se arrastran inhumanos malnacidos y desdichados, adentrarse en la oscuridad y gritar "¿Quién de vosotros cree en el Padre de todas las cosas, hermanos y hermanas?". E incluso allí, en la fosa más podrida de la existencia, oirá una respuesta, y si va en busca de esa voz, encontrará a un compañero más que digno. Todos los que creen en él y siguen sus pasos tienen la oportunidad de convertirse... en alguien más grande y más honrado».
languages.original_text: "This only proves that we will not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest hole in the universe, where only lowborn and wretched inhumans crawl, fall into darkness, and then cry out, 'Who here believes in the Allfather, sisters and brothers?' And even there, in the world's most rotten pit, you will hear an answer, and if you reach toward the voice, you will find a worthy companion. Everyone who believes in him and follows in his footsteps is given the chance to become... someone greater and more worthy."

Todos los que creen en él y siguen sus pasos tienen la oportunidad de convertirse... en alguien más grande y más honrado».

languages.text: 「アエット＝ヴァテル、これは、俺らが負けないことを証明するだけだ。宇宙で最も汚らわしい穴、下賎で惨めな人ならぬ化け物が這いずり回る穴の中に入って闇に落ち、『ここに全知の父を信じる者はいるか、兄弟姉妹よ』と泣き叫ぶのがいい。そんな場所ですら、世界で最も腐った穴の中でも、あんたは答えを聞くだろうし、その声のする方に手を伸ばせば、大切な仲間を見つけることができる。彼を信じ、彼の足跡をたどる者は皆…さらに偉大で、価値の高い人物になるチャンスを与えられるんだ」
languages.original_text: "This only proves that we will not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest hole in the universe, where only lowborn and wretched inhumans crawl, fall into darkness, and then cry out, 'Who here believes in the Allfather, sisters and brothers?' And even there, in the world's most rotten pit, you will hear an answer, and if you reach toward the voice, you will find a worthy companion. Everyone who believes in him and follows in his footsteps is given the chance to become... someone greater and more worthy."

traits.locale_text: 「アエット＝ヴァテル、これは、俺らが負けないことを証明するだけだ。宇宙で最も汚らわしい穴、下賎で惨めな人ならぬ化け物が這いずり回る穴の中に入って闇に落ち、 'ここに全知の父を信じる者はいるか、兄弟姉妹よ 'と泣き叫ぶのがいい。そんな場所ですら、世界で最も腐った穴の中でも、あんたは答えを聞くだろうし、その声のする方に手を伸ばせば、大切な仲間を見つけることができる。彼を信じ、彼の足跡をたどる者は皆...さらに偉大で、価値の高い人物になるチャンスを与えられるんだ」

languages.text: "Das beweist nur, dass wir nicht verlieren werden, Aett-Vater. Geht in das schändlichste Loch im Universum, wo nur Niedergeborene und widerwärtige Unmenschen herumkriechen, fallt in die Dunkelheit und ruft dann: 'Wer hier glaubt an den Allvater, Schwestern und Brüder?' Und selbst dort, in der verkommensten Grube der Welt, werdet Ihr eine Antwort hören, und wenn Ihr Eure Hand nach der Stimme ausstreckt, werdet Ihr einen würdigen Gefährten finden. Jeder, der an ihn glaubt und in seine Fußstapfen tritt, erhält die Chance zu etwas ... Größerem und Würdigerem zu werden."
languages.original_text: "This only proves that we will not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest hole in the universe, where only lowborn and wretched inhumans crawl, fall into darkness, and then cry out, 'Who here believes in the Allfather, sisters and brothers?' Jeder, der an ihn glaubt und in seine Fußstapfen tritt, erhält die Chance zu etwas ... Größerem und Würdigerem zu werden."

languages.text: « C'est la preuve que nous ne perdrons pas, aett-vater. Rendez-vous dans la pire fosse d'aisance de l'univers, là où seuls rampent les miséreux et les monstres non-humains, abîmez-vous dans les ténèbres et appelez-en aux fidèles du Père de Tous. Jusque dans cet antre de perdition, votre prière recevra une réponse, et si vous vous rapprochez de cette voix, vous trouverez un valeureux compagnon. Quiconque croit en lui et marche sur ses traces se voit octroyer une chance de devenir... quelqu'un de meilleur et de plus valeureux. »
languages.original_text: "This only proves that we will not lose, Aett-Vater. Go into the foulest hole in the universe, where only lowborn and wretched inhumans crawl, fall into darkness, and then cry out, 'Who here believes in the Allfather, sisters and brothers?' And even there, in the world's most rotten pit, you will hear an answer, and if you reach toward the voice, you will find a worthy companion. Everyone who believes in him and follows in his footsteps is given the chance to become... someone greater and more worthy."
